content:
I find it v hard to parse this
Running target/debug/deps/crate_name-e413e8bce173509a and think "oh thats the unit tests
and
Running target/debug/deps/integration_test-57299b2a8cfd7d68 and think "oh thats the file called integration_test in tests/"

Would anyone be opposed to a PR where I add more into in the cargo_test output on what its actually running?
I am wondering if cargo test output changes are breaking somehow
